mapper.select: select dept.*, ts.startTime, ts.stopTime from departmenttimeslot dept, timeslot ts where dept.departmentId = #{departmentId} and dept.timeslotId = ts.timeslotId and dept.capacity > (select count(appointmentId) from appointment where meetingFinished = 'N' and appointmentDate = #{appointmentDate} and departmentTimeId in (select departmentTimeId from departmenttimeslot where departmentId = #{departmentId}));
